predicate.note: Frames file for 'wad' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 26.5 and 9.3.

roleset.name: form into a wad

example.name: only made-up examples
example.text: Mary wadded her and John's marriage license into a tiny ball, ground it underfoot, doused it with lighter fluid, burned it, then put out the fire by peeing on it.

roleset.note: The phrasal "wad up" takes the same PAS, but the arg2 becomes rarer.
